Name: BetterBan
Description: A better ban system for Northstar

ConVars.Name: disconnect_message
ConVars.DefaultValue: You have been banned from this server. Please contact an admin to appeal.

ConCommands.Name: cbban
ConCommands.HelpString: Adds a player to the banlist

ConCommands.Name: cbunban
ConCommands.HelpString: Removes a player from the banlist

ConCommands.Name: cbbanuid
ConCommands.HelpString: Adds a player by uid to the banlist

ConCommands.Name: cbunbanuid
ConCommands.HelpString: Removes a player by uid from the banlist
